passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(8) > header:nth-child(2) > section > div:nth-child(1) > h1:nth-child(2)
html > body > div:nth-child(13) > div:nth-child(2) > footer > ul:nth-child(1) > li:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(13) > div:nth-child(2) > footer > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > form:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(5) > div > h2:nth-child(1)

any.message: Heading order valid

none.message: Value of lang attribute is included in the list of valid languages
